text:
Two more of America’s heroes were killed in a tactical vehicle accident during a training exercise.

This is a tragedy, and that's why I’m fighting in Congress to prevent these military training accidents from happening and ensure our soldiers' safety. foxnews.com/us/2-us-soldiers…
Happy 47th wedding anniversary to my wonderful wife, Sandy. Two sons and nine grandchildren later, I am forever thankful for the day we met in college.

Pleased to see the House pass several of my proposals to secure the border, combat human trafficking and prepare for disasters.

The House also passed 3 of my amendments this week to the defense spending bill.

I'll be working to see these signed into law! buchanan.house.gov/2023/9/u-…

Today, I wrote a letter to the CAO refusing my paycheck in the event of a government shutdown.

I also introduced legislation to prohibit members of Congress from getting paid for failing to do their jobs and fund the federal government. buchanan.house.gov/2023/9/wi…

JUST PASSED!

Pleased to see 3 of my proposals to improve safety measures for our service members and help boost Army recruitment pass the House!

America’s military deserves our unwavering support and I will work to see these provisions signed into law. buchanan.house.gov/press-rel…

CBP has seized 25,901 lbs of fentanyl at the southern border in 2023 so far – enough to kill 6 BILLION people.

This deadly opioid has flooded our nation and contributed to over 70,000 deaths in the U.S. last year. We need to secure the border and stop the flow of this drug now!

My staff will be holding mobile office hours over the next two weeks. Constituents with questions regarding a federal matter are encouraged to attend!

All locations and times can be found on my website.⬇️buchanan.house.gov/press-rel…

This week, President Biden claimed that so-called MAGA Republicans “continue to undermine our border security.”

This is one of the most laughable claims I've ever heard.

The WH is literally suing Texas for their efforts to secure the border, because Biden refuses to act.
I sincerely appreciate the great work the Coast Guard has done to clean up the spill in a timely manner, but area residents deserve to know exactly what happened and who is responsible. (4/4)
The Coast Guard has spent around $825,000 dollars on cleanup efforts. Someone must be held accountable and return that money back to taxpayers. (3/4)

After testing four oil samples from the spill against the 26 potential storage facilities and vessels at the port, the results were inconclusive. Capt. Kahle has sent the samples off for an additional round of DNA testing, hoping to find a potential match for the spill. (2/4)
Just got off the phone with Capt. Kahle from @USCGSoutheast to get an update on the investigation into the oil spill at Port Manatee. (1/4)

Honored to receive the Moffitt Momentum Award for my efforts to combat cancer and increase access to early tests and screenings.

While I appreciate the award, it’s Moffitt’s world-class care that deserves the recognition. We are lucky to have such great facilities in our region.

Least surprising news of the week?

Comes as the WH provides $6 billion to the rogue regime as part of hugely one-sided prisoner swap.

This is Biden's worst deal since he traded the Merchant of Death for Brittney Griner and left an American veteran behind.

The U.S. national debt just surpassed $33,000,000,000,000!

Interest payments on the debt alone are on pace to top $1 TRILLION a year and become the largest item in the federal budget.

This is not only unacceptable, it’s downright immoral.

Truly heartbreaking.

Ambush-style attacks on police have increased 43% in just the last year.

It’s well past time to pass my #ThinBlueLine Act to toughen penalties against those who intentionally target or kill cops and other first responders.
foxnews.com/us/los-angeles-p…

L’ Shanah Tova to all who will begin celebrating Rosh Hashanah this evening.
 
Wishing the Jewish community a joyous new year!

On National POW/MIA Recognition Day, we honor the brave U.S. servicemembers taken as prisoners of war, and remember those who never made it home.

You are not forgotten. May God bless them and their families.

While I’m pleased to see our Americans coming home, sending a $6 billion ransom payment to Iran is disgraceful and sends the absolute wrong message to our enemies around the globe and will only encourage future hostage taking.

washingtonexaminer.com/opini…

Pleased to speak with @USTradeRep Amb. Tai about the need to pursue new and ambitious trade agreements around the world.

If we don’t look beyond our borders to expand and sell more of our goods and services, America will lose influence abroad while also losing jobs here at home.

Good news: If you live in Hillsborough or Manatee County and were affected by Hurricane Idalia, you are now eligible to apply for Individual Assistance from FEMA. FEMA may be able to help take care of expenses and other serious needs that cannot be met through insurance.

Today marks 22 years since the heinous terrorist attacks on the World Trade Center. 

We must #NeverForget the innocent men, women and children that lost their lives as well as the heroic first responders that sacrificed life and limb to rescue survivors.
Whether an accident or purposeful, any potential bad actors must be held accountable for putting our waterways at risk. (3/3)
With no evidence pointing to any infrastructure failures or pipeline leaks so far, it looks increasingly likely that someone may have dumped this oil and is failing to come forward. (2/3)

Just finished touring SeaPort Manatee following the recent oil spill. (1/3)
buchanan.house.gov/2023/9/bu…

Whether part of an accident or a purposeful oil dump into our waterways, we need to get to the bottom of exactly what happened to determine who is responsible and help prevent any future, dangerous spills in our backyard. (4/4)
The Coast Guard is continuing their investigation into the source of the spill and I look forward to its timely resolution. (3/4)
Of the 19,000 gallons of contaminated water removed from the port, approximately 3,500 gallons of that was very heavy, unrefined oil. (2/4)

Spoke with Captain Michael Kahle, Sector Commander for the U.S. Coast Guard who confirmed that 90-95% of the oil spilled at Port Manatee has been removed. They will continue cleanup efforts until 100% compete, which will likely be the end of this week or early next week. (1/4)

President Biden can continue to twist the facts and tout the supposed “benefits” of Bidenomics until he’s blue in the face, but the American people aren’t buying it.

In fact, 61% of Americans are living paycheck to paycheck and only 37% support his handling of the economy.
If you see oil pollution anywhere outside of the port, call the U.S. National Response Team at 800-424-8802. (5/5) tampabay.com/news/environmen…
Our local waterways, environment and marine life are too important to area residents and Florida’s tourism-based economy to ignore this problem. (4/5)

While no determination has been made as to the source of the spill yet, you can rest assured that I will continue to monitor the issue closely and work to hold any potential bad actors accountable. (3/5)
They assured me that @USCGSoutheast has contained the spill to within the port and will continue cleanup efforts until they have removed all of the contaminated water and oily debris. (2/5)
Just got off the phone with port officials following the deeply disturbing crude oil spill at Port Manatee. (1/5)

Pleased to meet with Manatee County’s newest commissioner for District 5, Ray Turner, who was sworn in to the Board of County Commissioners last month.

I look forward to working with him and continuing to ensure our area is the best place to live, work and raise a family.

White House Press Secretary Karine Jean-Pierre: “The president has done more to secure the border … than anybody else.”

She’s gotta be kidding, right?

Pleased to join @SenRickScott and several of my Florida colleagues in calling on President Biden to approve a Major Disaster Declaration for our state following Hurricane Idalia.

This declaration will unlock critical federal resources to help Floridians begin to recover.

Flooding is currently a major problem for our area. You should never walk or drive through standing water as downed powerlines can be hidden beneath the surface.

View active road closures below. Be safe!

Manatee: manateegis.maps.arcgis.com/a…

Hillsborough: hillsboroughcounty.org/en/re…

If there’s one thing I know about my friend and colleague @SteveScalise, it’s that he’s a fighter.

Sandy and I are praying for him, his family and his entire team as he undergoes treatment and wish him a speedy recovery.

He is an incredible leader and inspiration to all of us.

While Hurricane Idalia continues to shift north, we're not out of the woods yet. Our area could still experience severe winds and storm surge.

Sign up to receive emergency alerts below and please stay safe!

Manatee: mymanatee.org/departments/pu…

Hillsborough: hillsboroughcounty.org/en/re…

Evacuation orders have been issued for parts of Manatee and Hillsborough Counties.

For the most up-to-date information on evacuation orders and shelter locations, visit your county’s website.

Manatee: manatee.hosted.civiclive.com…

Hillsborough: hillsboroughcounty.org/resid…

Stay safe!

As Tropical Storm Idalia strengthens, Manatee and Hillsborough Counties today opened self-serve sandbag stations to prepare for the storm. Bags are provided with a limit of 10 per household.

Visit buchanan.house.gov/hurricane… for links to local, state and federal hurricane resources.

While it’s too early to know if the storm will have any impact to our area, it’s never too early to prepare. 

Use the weekend to gas up your car, stock up on water and non-perishable food items and prepare a go-kit if evacuations are necessary. heraldtribune.com/story/news…

Early preparation and being ready to evacuate at a moment’s notice is absolutely critical before a storm hits, especially for our more vulnerable senior population.

For more information on how to be ready in the event of a hurricane, visit buchanan.house.gov/hurricane…. (3/3)

Dr. Brennan mentioned that 75% of the direct fatalities from Hurricane Ian were among those aged 52 and older. Furthermore, NOAA recently increased their prediction of a "near normal" 2023 Atlantic hurricane season to an "above normal" season. (2/3)

Today, I hosted a call with members of the Florida congressional delegation and @NHC_Atlantic's Dr. Michael Brennan and @FLSERT's Luke Strickland to discuss the current outlook for the remainder of hurricane season. (1/3)

Great to tour Two Docks Shellfish today with Commissioner Van Ostenbridge. It’s encouraging to see the work a local small business is doing to put fresh seafood on people's tables while simultaneously working to improve water quality in the area. buchanan.house.gov/2023/8/bu…

Honored to receive the Congressional Champion Award from the @alzassociation's Ryan Schiff and Michele and Doug Hall.

Michele, one of my constituents with Alzheimer's, is one of the reasons I'm fighting to ensure patients have access to breakthrough Alzheimer’s treatments.

Today is National Fentanyl Prevention and Awareness Day. Fentanyl overdoses are the number 1 killer of Americans aged 18-45.

The House passed legislation to permanently classify deadly fentanyl as a Schedule I drug. Time for the Senate to send this bill to Biden’s desk.

The 16th District Congressional Veteran Commendation was established to recognize the exceptional military and community service of veterans in our area. If you know a veteran worthy of this honor, read below and visit my website to submit a nomination.
buchanan.house.gov/congressi…

A big thank you to my district office interns for their hard work this summer! I look forward to seeing what you accomplish in the future.

If you’re interested in interning in one of my district offices or on Capitol Hill, visit my website to apply. buchanan.house.gov/internshi…

It's been one year since the Inflation Reduction Act was signed into law.

While many of us have known the truth all along, even Biden is admitting that it had "nothing to do with inflation."

The reality is inflation is up 16.9% since Biden took office.
apnews.com/article/biden-inf…

Two years ago today, Kabul fell to the Taliban.

The events surrounding our disastrous Afghanistan withdrawal – including the deaths of 13 U.S. service members – marked the worst U.S. foreign policy failure in a generation.

The American people deserve answers and accountability.

Texas is only doing what the Biden WH has failed to do – enforce our laws and curb the endless flow of illegal immigration.

Pleased to join @RepArrington in opposing the Biden administration's misguided attempt to block Texas from securing the border. thecentersquare.com/texas/ar…
Happy first day of school to students, teachers and parents in Hillsborough and Manatee Counties! Wishing all another successful and engaging school year.

61% of Americans are living paycheck to paycheck

74% think our country is on the wrong track

63% disapprove of Biden’s handling of the economy

Yet Biden continues to whistle past the graveyard and claim that “Bidenomics” is working...

This is the definition of out of touch.

As gold star families mourn the loss of the 13 U.S. servicemembers in the catastrophic Afghanistan withdrawal two years ago, taxpayer dollars may be fattening the pockets of Taliban terrorists.

Congress needs to get to the bottom of this immediately.
freebeacon.com/national-secu…

Planning to travel abroad within the next year? Check your passport’s expiration date ASAP!

Passport renewal wait times have increased significantly. If you need help renewing a passport or have any questions, feel free to call my office at 941-951-6643.

Today we remember and honor the brave men and women in uniform who were injured on the battlefield or made the ultimate sacrifice on behalf of our nation. We cannot thank them enough for their steadfast service.

Looking to hack our country's immigration system and enter our country illegally?

There's an app for that.

This is not just a humanitarian crisis, this is a major national security risk.
washingtonexaminer.com/polic…

Very saddened to hear of Johnette's passing. She was a visionary leader who led the charge in revitalizing downtown Bradenton and developing the Riverwalk.

She will be greatly missed but her legacy will always live on in the Friendly City.
heraldtribune.com/story/news…

More than 183 million Americans receive health coverage through their employers.

It was great meeting with representatives from Americas Health Insurance Plans about what Congress can do to ensure businesses can provide affordable, quality health benefits for their employees.

Paging President Biden!

When even liberal cities like New York are begging for help from the federal government to end the self-inflicted illegal immigrant crisis, you know it’s bad.

As if we needed further proof that sanctuary cities don’t make sense.
foxnews.com/us/nyc-mayor-eri…

A special thank you to my interns for their hard work this summer! I wish them the best of luck in their future endeavors.

Interested in interning on Capitol Hill? I’m currently accepting applicants for this fall. Apply on my website here: buchanan.house.gov/internshi…

It’s been a trying year for Florida’s farmers and ranchers. As we enter peak hurricane season, we must do everything we can to protect Florida’s $159 billion Ag industry.

I look forward to continuing talks with my colleagues about our state’s priorities in the 2023 Farm Bill.

Great meeting of the bipartisan Florida congressional delegation on agriculture this morning. I’m confident that our state will secure necessary wins for Florida’s farmers and ranchers in this year’s Farm Bill. buchanan.house.gov/2023/7/bu…

The Florida Congressional Delegation is joined by a great panel of witnesses this morning. 

R.J. Layher with @FarmBureau
Dr. Scott Angle with @UF
Mike Risola with FL Dept. of Ag
Susan King with @FeedingFlorida
Just kicked off the Florida Congressional Delegation Meeting with @RepDWStweets. Tune in here: piped.video/live/KtNYdTB-1Us…

Truly insane.

The Biden Justice Department is SUING Texas for doing what they refuse to do: SECURE THE BORDER!

It’s abundantly clear that this administration has no interest in actually stopping the endless flow of illegals entering our country. nypost.com/2023/07/24/doj-su…
Great crowd last night for the 16th District Law Enforcement Awards! The men and women in uniform that serve our community are some of our nation’s finest.

Honored to announce the winners of this year’s 16th Congressional District Law Enforcement Awards. Every day, these brave men and women put themselves in harm's way to protect our community. We can't thank them enough for their courage and sacrifice. buchanan.house.gov/2023/7/bu…

Today kicks off Florida’s Back-to-School Sales Tax Holiday, where you can shop for your children’s school supplies tax free!

For a full list of tax-free items, visit floridarevenue.com/backtosch….

Look forward to hosting a meeting of the bipartisan Florida congressional delegation this week focused on agriculture and our state's priorities in the upcoming Farm Bill.

Agriculture is absolutely critical to Florida, supporting more than 2 million jobs. buchanan.house.gov/2023/7/ad…

Shockingly, millions of dogs and cats are slaughtered worldwide for human consumption annually.

In 2018, my bill outlawing the practice in the U.S. was signed into law.

Now, @RepMoskowitz and I are calling for an end to this disturbing practice globally. buchanan.house.gov/2023/7/bu…

Pleased to stand with Israel, our strongest ally in the Middle East, by voting for @RepPfluger’s resolution. We must send a resounding message that Israel has our unwavering support and that anti-Senitism has no place in our country.

Thanks to @TheHill for having me today at their More Than Memory Loss event. 

Great to talk about my family’s experience with Alzheimer’s and the need to help patients access new breakthrough treatments coming to market.
The federal government should follow suit and help ease access to these drugs for our nation’s most vulnerable patients. (2/2)

Very encouraged by the latest news for the 6.7 million Americans suffering from this terrible disease.

I will continue fighting in Congress to ensure all patients have access to these potentially life-changing new treatments. (1/2)
reuters.com/business/healthc…

Pleased to announce that FIVE of my provisions just passed the House in this year’s NDAA.

Addressing the health and safety of our brave servicemen and women will always be one of my top priorities. buchanan.house.gov/2023/7/fi…

More than 8,400 service members were wrongfully discharged for refusing to take the COVID vaccine.

That’s why @HouseGOP is taking action to reinstate these brave individuals and reverse this disgraceful decision in this year’s NDAA.

This is Joe Biden's America.

Current federal spending is not just out-of-control, it's immoral.

And despite Biden's continued and unwarranted bragging about reducing the deficit, the data proves that the deficit is actually DOUBLE the size as it was before the pandemic.

For the first time in two decades, the FDA has granted traditional approval to an Alzheimer’s treatment.

While this is encouraging news, CMS continues to create unnecessary barriers to this drug for the millions of patients suffering from this disease. reuters.com/business/healthc…

Pleased to see legislation I’ve introduced to help victims of domestic abuse, like my constituent Rachael Booth, included in this year’s NDAA.

Our legislation will help these victims receive financial assistance to get back on their feet.buchanan.house.gov/2023/7/bu…

Despite the administration’s laughable attempt to reclaim the phrase, #Bidenomics has cost every American household nearly $10,000.

Tax hikes, massive federal spending and crippling regulations are destroying our economy and family budgets. foxnews.com/politics/biden-r…

The slaughter of horses for human consumption is a barbaric practice that has no place in America.

I look forward to continuing to lead efforts with @RepSchakowsky and @AWIOnline to protect these majestic creatures. heraldtribune.com/story/opin…

Have a happy and safe Independence Day!

Thank you to all who have served or are serving at home and abroad to protect the freedoms we hold dear.

Thank you, SCOTUS!

Pleased to see the highest court in the land rule Biden’s $400 billion student loan bailout UNCONSTITUTIONAL!

Taxpayers that made the hard decisions and played by the rules should not be forced to pay the bills of the 13% of Americans with student loan debt.

As we celebrate Independence Day next week, I plan to introduce 3 bills to combat veteran suicides, protect veteran benefits and improve military training procedures.

Our service members and veterans deserve all the care and respect our nation can offer. buchanan.house.gov/press-rel…

Gas stoves and pizza ovens and dishwashers, oh my!

Rather than tackle the biggest issues of the day affecting real Americans, the Biden administration and liberal politicians are spinning their wheels and working overtime to regulate every aspect of our daily lives.

Just 34% of Americans approve Biden's handling of the economy.

Yet the WH is doubling down on their same failed policies and promising to put “equity at the center of it.”

I'm sure that's exactly what families struggling with inflation and negative real wage growth want to hear

On #PTSDAwarenessDay, we must recognize that not all wounds are visible, especially for America’s brave service members.

That’s why I’ve introduced a bill to identify holes in the current mental health care system for our soldiers and help reduce military suicides.

Thanks to @adamgoodman3 for having me on his podcast, @13thandPark. We talk about the American dream, fiscal responsibility, combatting China, lowering health care costs and more.

Watch here or listen anywhere you get your podcasts. piped.video/watch?v=CIjF6-oe…

The results are in, and it's abundantly clear that onerous school lockdown policies had a devastating impact on our schoolchildren.

Parents and families should determine what type of learning environment is best for their children, not union bosses like Randi Weingarten.

Congrats to the winners of the 2023 Congressional Art Competition! The first-place winner from the 16th District was Skylar Goldrick of Bayshore High. Arthur (Xiaoyi) Li of Saint Stephen’s Episcopal School was this year’s “Facebook Fan Favorite” winner. buchanan.house.gov/press-rel…

My staff will be holding mobile office hours over the next two weeks. Constituents with questions regarding a federal matter are encouraged to attend!

All locations and times can be found on my website ⬇️buchanan.house.gov/2023/6/ma…

The iconic Star-Spangled Banner has flown o’er the Land of the Free for 246 years. It is a symbol of freedom around the world that many brave men and women have made the ultimate sacrifice for. May we continue to fly it with pride. Happy Flag Day!

The pandemic taught us that home health services are invaluable for seniors in my district and nationwide.

That’s why I introduced legislation to ensure that patients can continue receiving these life-saving drugs from the comfort of their own homes. buchanan.house.gov/2023/6/bu…

We need to do much more to combat military overdoses and improve service members’ access to  mental health care.

That’s why I am urging the House Armed Services Committee to include two of my bills in this year’s NDAA to address these two urgent issues. buchanan.house.gov/2023/6/bu…

From brazenly flying a gigantic spy balloon across the U.S., to buying up vast swaths of farmland near our sensitive military sites, to operating a secret spy base in Cuba, it’s clear the WH needs to wake up and show China that such wanton acts of aggression will not be tolerated

Pleased to announce my 2023 U.S. Service Academy appointments! These outstanding young men & women should take pride in having successfully competed with so many students nationwide. I have full confidence that they will serve our nation with distinction. buchanan.house.gov/press-rel…

Pleased to see the FDA taking the next step toward traditional approval of another breakthrough Alzheimer’s treatment.

Once approved, there is no reason why unelected bureaucrats at CMS should continue to block access to this drug for the millions suffering from this disease

Chinese aggression is no longer just on the other side of the Pacific.

It’s 90 miles off of Florida’s coast.

While Biden continues to do nothing and undermine American leadership on the world stage, China flexes its muscles and continues to provoke us. foxnews.com/politics/china-r…
My friend and colleague from Florida gets it ⬇️

NYC is fueling America’s drug epidemic by giving out free crack pipes in vending machines.

Cities should be cracking down on illegal drugs – not normalizing “safe drug abuse.”

NEWSFLASH: Drugs abuse is never “safe” and claims the lives of more than 100,000 Americans every year.

A dozen racehorse deaths at one track in one month is concerning and unacceptable.

As co-chairs of the Animal Protection Caucus, @RepBlumenauer and I are committed to getting to the bottom of this and preventing unnecessary deaths moving forward. buchanan.house.gov/2023/6/bu…
I will continue to work with Kimberly and Nicholas’ father Anthony to get this measure introduced in the Florida legislature. I praise them for their strength and courage. (3/3)
It has been my honor to work with his mother Kimberly Weaver on successful efforts to reform training procedures and improve emergency response capabilities on U.S. military bases. (2/3)

Thank you to the Manatee County Commission for the unanimous approval of my request that they urge the Florida legislature to designate a portion of US 19 a Memorial Highway in honor of Nicholas Panipinto, who died tragically in a military training accident in South Korea. (1/3)

Today, 79 years ago, more than 160,000 Allied troops launched the largest amphibious invasion in history to liberate Nazi-occupied Europe during WWII. We will never forget the heroism and sacrifice of our incredible service members in what became a major turning point in the war.

Congratulations to Sally Shely, my long-time district director, on her upcoming retirement. I sincerely thank her for her selfless service.

I’m also pleased to welcome Tara Poulton to the team as the new district director. Excited for the years ahead! buchanan.house.gov/press-rel…

Pleased to see HISA and Churchill Downs taking new steps to ensure the health and safety of thoroughbreds.

Last month, @repblumenauer and I led a letter calling for an immediate investigation into these alarming deaths and a thorough review of current protocols.

This week marks the beginning of hurricane season.

Through June 9, Florida is having a sales tax holiday on hurricane preparedness supplies. View the full list of tax-free items below and visit my website for more information on how to be prepared.
buchanan.house.gov/hurricane…

Congratulations to @USouthFlorida for joining the Association of American Universities.

As a member of the most prestigious higher education association, USF will have more opportunities to pursue groundbreaking research and attract academic talent. Go Bulls!

A vote for this bill is a vote for reinforcing Washington’s wasteful spending habits.
 
I will be voting NO. Enough is enough! (2/2)

Nobody wants to default on our debt, but neither can we afford to keep spending money we don't have.
 
Very disappointed to see this bill increase the national debt by $4 trillion in half as many years and do very little to actually get our fiscal house in order. (1/2)
As we commemorate Memorial Day today, please take a minute and join me in honoring those who made the ultimate sacrifice for our country. We owe them a debt that we can never repay.
Congratulations to the @PCHSBulls softball team for their big win and the first state championship in school history! Go Bulls! heraldtribune.com/story/spor…

Pleased to see the House pass legislation to crack down on deadly fentanyl, which is pouring across our southern border.

The House-passed bill closely mirrors my bill, the FIGHT Fentanyl Act, which permanently classifies fentanyl as a Schedule I drug. buchanan.house.gov/press-rel…

The recent string of racehorse deaths in the weeks surrounding the Kentucky Derby and Preakness Stakes are very curious and highly concerning.

That’s why @repblumenauer and I are demanding answers. buchanan.house.gov/press-rel…

Can’t make this up! It should come as no surprise that he lives in Florida though. 

Our state is #1 for:

🏆 Higher education
🏆 Economic freedom
🏆 Small businesses

Florida is the best state to live, work and raise a family — for ALL Americans. dailywire.com/news/naacp-lea…

Under Biden, two million illegal immigrants have been released into the U.S.

Now, matters will only get worse as immigrants are not even told to appear in court for a full decade!

It’s laughable to think these folks will ever actually appear before a judge at all.

When even the Washington Post gives Biden a “Bottomless Pinocchio” for endlessly repeating a lie that he cut the deficit by $1.7 trillion – you know it’s bad.

The left-leaning newspaper debunks his talking point and calls it “highly misleading.”
washingtonpost.com/politics/…

International trade is critical to Florida, where we have 15 deepwater ports and 1 in 5 jobs is trade related.

Pleased to speak with @SecRaimondo about China’s rising global influence the need for America to reengage with our trading partners around the world.

The slaughter of horses for consumption is a barbaric practice that has no place in America. Pleased to be leading the effort with @RepSchakowsky again to ban domestic horse slaughter and protect these majestic creatures. buchanan.house.gov/press-rel…

So glad to see these incredible creatures rehabilitated and returned to the wild by @MoteMarineLab.

See the article for more info on how beachgoers can keep turtles safe during nesting season. bradenton.com/news/local/art…

Please join me in honoring our local police departments and law enforcement officers across the country as we recognize National Police Week. The men and women in blue put their lives on the line to keep our communities safe. They deserve our unwavering support.

Prioritizing illegal immigrants over veterans who served our nation in uniform is downright disgraceful.

We have a long way to go help our homeless veterans get back on their feet – this takes us in the opposite direction. foxnews.com/media/biden-admi…

The overwhelming majority of performing artists are working-class Americans trying to support their families.

In an op-ed for @tax, @RepJudyChu and I discuss our legislation to give tax parity to low and middle-income performers. news.bloomberglaw.com/tax-in…

Welcome to Manatee County, @ScottBaio!

I know you’ll have many more “Happy Days” in the Sunshine State with it’s low-tax burden, business-friendly environment and great quality of life. Florida is a special place to live and raise a family. foxbusiness.com/entertainmen…

Under the Biden administration, our border is wide open.

Today, House Republicans took action to tackle Biden’s border crisis and bring an end to the chaos at the southern border.

Mr. Gonzales’s heartbreaking story sends a message shared by too many: Government needs to get out of the way of patients accessing FDA-approved and potentially life-saving treatments.
 
Alzheimer's care should be dictated by patients and their doctors. Period.

When even Biden admits the southern border will be “chaotic for a while,” you know it’s bad.

That’s why this week @HouseGOP is voting to:
✔️Resume construction of the border wall
✔️Increase the number of CBP agents
✔️End catch and release

The time for inaction is over.

At today's @WaysandMeansGOP hearing in Staten Island, I spotlighted why the U.S. needs to engage in international trade to protect workers and secure our supply chains.

The president can’t simply “go it alone” when it comes to trade. He needs to work with Congress.

Biden’s open border policies plus the end of Title 42 are a giant welcome sign for immigrants to enter our country illegally.

According to reports, as many as 700,000 people are waiting in Mexico to cross when Title 42 ends this week.

We need to secure the border NOW.

Honored to receive the Spirit of Enterprise Award from the U.S. Chamber of Commerce for my support of pro-growth policies in Congress. Small businesses are the backbone of our local economy and ensuring their success is one of my top priorities in Congress.

Seven throughbred deaths in as many days raises serious questions about what exactly is going on in this sport. As co-chair of the Animal Protection Caucus, one of my top priorities is ensuring the safety and well-being of all animals, including the world’s top racehorses.

On this National Day of Prayer, please join me in praying for our nation’s security and the safety of our troops overseas.
 
May God bless the United States of America.

Great to meet with the Florida Hospital Association, which represents 321 hospitals in Florida that serve 11 million patients per year.
